claim_card.claim: The primary morphology-sensitive separation (D1_L2 and Z_mf) remains stable after expanding the Gaussian cohort to n=40 per lmax and applying Gaussian seed-band cohort hygiene filtering.
claim_card.test_hook: Repeat aggregation with expanded Gaussian controls and seed-band filtering; verify unchanged qualitative cohort ranking and persistent separation on D1_L2 and Z_mf.
